name: CatchO'Run
description:
Since the Ancient Times two races lived in a Boxerott.. One named Catchers and another named Runners. Both in a need of each other they are tormented to play an inescapable game of survival. Together with your friend take a Role of Catcher or Runner. Evade from your opponent or Keep him as close as you can!

WASD - controls the Runner

Mouse - controls the Hunter; Press LMB to move and RMB to CATCH your PREY!
